author: ryanleeschneider
content:
Ok, cool, glad to hear it.  Thanks for mentioning it though, now I'm nerd sniped into making sure I understand pre-EIP-658 receipts. ðŸ™‚  In doing so I found this nice simple "test case" pre-Byzantium block w/ a single  tx in it: https://etherscan.io/block/2284956

I made sure that I can successfully recompute the RLP for the above tx json payload (pulled from our mainnet JSONRPC endpoint) here: https://github.com/INFURA/go-ethlibs/pull/63
and dusted off super simple receipt trie verification code for single item tries I wrote awhile back: https://replit.com/@ryanleeschneider/TrieTest

So everything looks good to me, and as a bonus I added pre-Byzantium support to go-ethlibs.
